'''IGAC''', InspecÃ§Ã£o Geral das Actividades Culturais (portuguese for General Inspection of Cultural Activities), is an organization, part of the Portuguese Ministry of Culture. [[Image:IGAC.jpg|right|70px]]<br>
  +
It is the organization responsible for the rating of videogames, movies and related media released in [[Portugal]].
